Located on a sprawling land area of 9.7 hectares (90, 700 square meters), it was the first public high school in the municipality and strategically situated in the town center of Janiuay, Iloilo. Under R.A. 6667 dated June 22, 1990, authored by then congressman, Hon. Licurgo P. Tirador, renamed the school to Don Tiburcio A. Lutero National Comprehensive High School, in honor of its founder, the late congressman Tiburcio Alianza Lutero.
